---
title: "Analog Interval Threshold"
---

## Purpose

The Analog Interval Threshold transform detects intervals where an `AnalogTimeSeries` crosses a specified threshold. It creates a `DigitalIntervalSeries` containing the start and end times of these intervals.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Description | Default |
|---|---|---|---|
| `threshold_value` | double | The value that the signal must cross to be considered a threshold crossing. | 0.0 |
| `direction` | string | The direction of the threshold crossing. One of "Positive (Rising)", "Negative (Falling)", "Absolute (Magnitude)". | "Positive (Rising)" |
| `lockout_time` | double | The minimum time (in seconds) between detected intervals. | 0.0 |
| `min_duration` | double | The minimum duration (in seconds) for an interval to be kept. | 0.0 |
| `missing_data_mode` | string | How to handle missing data points. One of "Treat as Zero (Default)", "Ignore Missing Points". | "Treat as Zero (Default)" |

## JSON Schema

```json
{
    "type" : "object",
             "properties" : {
                 "transform": {
                     "type": "string",
                     "const": "Threshold Interval Detection"
                 },
                 "input": {
                     "type": "string"
                 },
                 "output": {
                     "type": "string"
                 },
                 "params": {
                     "type": "object",
                     "properties": {
                         "threshold_value": {
                             "type": "number"
                         },
                         "direction": {
                             "type": "string",
                             "enum": ["Positive (Rising)", "Negative (Falling)", "Absolute (Magnitude)"]
                         },
                         "lockout_time": {
                             "type": "number"
                         },
                         "min_duration": {
                             "type": "number"
                         },
                         "missing_data_mode": {
                             "type": "string",
                             "enum": ["Treat as Zero (Default)", "Ignore Missing Points"]
                         }
                     },
                     "required": ["threshold_value", "direction"]
                 }
             },
                            "required" : ["transform", "input", "output", "params"]
}
```

        ##Minimal Example

                This example detects intervals where the `my_analog_series` signal rises above a value of 5.0.

```json {
    "transform" : "Threshold Interval Detection",
                  "input" : "my_analog_series",
                            "output" : "thresholded_intervals",
                                       "params" : {
        "threshold_value" : 5.0,
                "direction" : "Positive (Rising)"
    }
}
```
